machine_extruder_start_code.default_value:
;start T1

M104 T1 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0}
G1 X41 Y35 F9000 ; go to wipe position
M109 T1 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0}; wait for temp
G1 E10 F300; prime
G92 E0
G1 X21 Y15 F3000; wipe
G1 X34 F9000
G1 Y35 F6000; wipe again

M117 printing...

machine_extruder_end_code.default_value:
M104 T1 S{material_standby_temperature}
G1 X41 Y35 F9000 ; go to wipe position
M109 T1 R{material_standby_temperature}; wait for temp
G1 X21 Y15 F3000; wipe
G1 X31 F9000
G1 Y35 F6000; wipe again

;end T1
